sentences.en: Doctor had to amputate his arm to save his life.
sentences.cn: 医生必须将他的手臂截肢来保全他的生命.

sentences.en: Doctor: Your legs were injured so badly that we had to amputate both of them.
sentences.cn: 医生: 你的双腿严重受伤,我们不得不将它们全部切除.

sentences.en: He agreed to have an operation to amputate his left foot which had become gangrenous.
sentences.cn: 他同意做手术,截除坏疽的左脚.

sentences.en: Her arm is so badly injured they will have to amputate ( it ).
sentences.cn: 她的胳膊伤势严重,他们不得不锯掉 ( 它 ).

sentences.en: Her arm is so badly injured they will have to amputate.
sentences.cn: 她的胳膊伤势严重,他们不得不锯掉.

sentences.en: Her leg was so badly damaged that the doctors had to amputate it.
sentences.cn: 她的那条腿伤得很厉害,医师只得将其截除.

sentences.en: In the end they had to amputate his foot to free him from the wrecked car.
sentences.cn: 最后他们不得不截断他的脚才把他从撞坏的车中救出来.

sentences.en: In these cases there is no choice but to amputate.
sentences.cn: 在这些病例中,除了截肢别无他法.

sentences.en: It may be necessary to amputate his foot.

sentences.cn: 目的探讨护理程序在接受断指再植手术后围手术期病人中的应用.

sentences.en: Sometimes we even amputate a limb.'
The orthopaedic doctor decided to amputate her limb and very likely she would need adjuvant chemotherapy.
sentences.cn: 骨科医生决定替她截肢,她也很可能需要辅助的化疗.

sentences.en: The vet says amputate or he'll have to be put to sleep.
sentences.cn: 兽医说要么截肢,要么只有安乐死.

sentences.en: This is serious; I am afraid we'll have to amputate his leg.
sentences.cn: 这事很严重, 恐怕我们必须锯掉他的腿.

sentences.en: Two of her toes were amputated because of frostbite.
sentences.cn: 她的两个脚趾因为冻伤被截掉了。

trans.tran_en: to cut off someone’s arm, leg, finger etc during a medical operation

trans.tran_cn: （用外科手术）截（肢等），切断，砍掉，删除
